title.en: Moto Keikoku no Bijo to Flag Crusher Outaishi

altTitles.ja: 元・傾国の美女とフラグクラッシャー王太子
元・傾国の美女とフラグクラッシャー王太子　転生しても処刑エンドが回避できません!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Moto Keikoku no Bijo to Flag Crusher Outaishi: Tensei Shitemo Shokei End ga Kaihi Dekimasen?!
Moto keikoku no bijo to furagukurasshā ō taishi: tensei shite mo shokei endo ga kaihi dekimasen?!

altTitles.en: The Former Homewrecker and Flag-Crushing Crown Prince
The Former Homewrecker and Flag-Crushing Crown Prince: Even After I Reincarnated, I Still Can't Avoid the Execution Ending?!

description.en:
Azalea, a duke’s daughter, was once known as the “Wicked Woman Who Ruined the Country” in her previous life and was executed on those false charges.

All she wanted in her second life was to live peacefully without being involved in politics or power struggles… but for some reason, she was chosen to be Crown Prince Lotus’ fiancée.

Lotus is a problem child that even his parents, the king and queen themselves, have no idea how to handle. Even though Azalea is being thrown into chaos by the eccentric actions of this extreme genius, gradually, she finds that she can’t leave the boy alone…

So begins a pure love story filled with nonstop gags and romance!
description.ja:
「国を傾けた皇妃」として無実の罪で処刑された前世を持つ公爵令嬢・アザレア。
今世は権力に振り回されず穏やかな人生を送りたい……そう思っていたのに、なぜか次期国王・ロータスの婚約者に選ばれてしまう。
ロータスは、両親である国王と王妃でさえ手がつけられないほどの超問題児。
天才過ぎて常人には理解できない言動に振り回されていたアザレアだったけれど、だんだん彼のことを放っておけなくなって……？
ツッコミとラブがノンストップな純愛コメディが開幕！

電子限定特典として描き下ろしイラストを特別収録★
